title: Perfect Garlic Bread
ingredients: ['110g butter, softened', '2 tablespoons mayonnaise', '1/4 teaspoon sage', '3 cloves garlic, chopped', '2 teaspoons dried oregano', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '1/2 teaspoon black pepper', '1 French baguette, halved lengthways', '2 tablespoons grated Parmesan cheese or to taste']
